text:
Hey everyone!
I'm not sure if this the right channel and if it isn't please let me know -
I'm looking for docs & tutorials on how to add functionality to WooCommerce Plugin of HubSpot -
Should I do via an add-on? and if so how?
or I should just add to the plugin code directly?

Thanks you!

Hey - Managed to do find it myself - For anyone looking for this in the future:
HubSpot Woocommerce Plugin Developers did a really good job on providing filters and actions hooks for developers to extend the plugin functionality - you create a separate plugin with you code which extend the HubSpot plugin using those filters and actions - that way the HubSpot Plugin still able to receive updates,
If you are looking for the filters and actions you can just download the plugin and ctrl+shift+f for
apply_filters
or
do_action

Good Luck
